response: "I feel like I'm constantly being judged for everything I do, and I can't handle the pressure anymore."
"Why does everyone expect me to be perfect? I'm only human, I make mistakes."
"I'm so tired of trying to live up to everyone else's standards. When can I just live for myself?"
"I don't understand why I can't be happy with who I am. Why do I always feel like I need to change something?"
"I'm starting to feel like I'm losing myself in this pursuit of perfection. Who am I even trying to impress?"
"It's like no matter how hard I try, it's never enough. I'm so tired of feeling like a failure."
"Why do I have to look a certain way, act a certain way, be a certain way? Can't I just be me?"
"I hate feeling like I have to constantly prove myself to others. It's exhausting."
"I'm so overwhelmed by all the expectations placed on me. I don't know how to handle it."
"I wish I could just escape from all of this and be free to be myself without judgement."
